Plot variable median per cluster from reference metadata vs new assigned metadata, for visually evaluating classification

Source: R/plot.R
plot_cols.Rd

Plot variable median per cluster from reference metadata vs new assigned metadata, for visually evaluating classification

plot_cols(metadata, cluster_col, cluster_col_called, plot_col,
  metadata_ref, cluster_col_ref, plot_col_ref)

Arguments

metadata

clustify-ed metadata
cluster_col

metadata column for original clustering
cluster_col_called

metadata column for clustifyR assignments
plot_col

metadata column to plot
metadata_ref

reference single cell RNA seq metadata
cluster_col_ref

metadata column for cluster for reference
plot_col_ref

metadata column to plot for reference

Contents

  • Arguments
